verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD שִׁ֣ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Shi-ru Sing לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> shir song חָדָ֑שׁ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash; a new תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To, [and] his praise בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> bik-Hal in the congregation חֲסִידִֽים׃ <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dim. of saints

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Let Israel בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו <S%H6213><s%> be-'o-Sav; in him that made בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- him let the children צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, of Zion יָגִ֥ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gi-lu be joyful בְמַלְכָּֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> ve-mal-Kam. in their King

יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-Lu Let them praise שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name בְמָח֑וֹל <S%H4234><s%> ve-ma-Chol; in the dance בְּתֹ֥ף <S%H8596><s%> be-Tof unto him with the timbrel וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor, and harp יְזַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> ye-zam-me-ru- let them sing praises לֽוֹ׃ lo.

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for רוֹצֶ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> ro-Tzeh taketh pleasure יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Mo; in his people יְפָאֵ֥ר <S%H6286><s%> ye-fa-'Er he will beautify עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים <S%H6035><s%> 'a-na-Vim, the meek בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'Ah. with salvation

יַעְלְז֣וּ <S%H5937><s%> ya'-le-Zu be joyful חֲסִידִ֣ים <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dim Let the saints בְּכָב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> be-cha-Vod; in glory יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-ne-Nu, let them sing aloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4904><s%> mish-ke-vo-Tam. upon their beds

רוֹמְמ֣וֹת <S%H7319><s%> rom-Mot [Let] the high אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> 'el [praises] of God בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1627><s%> big-ro-Nam; [be] in their mouth וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev sword פִּֽיפִיּ֣וֹת <S%H6374><s%> pi-fi-Yot and a twoedged בְּיָדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam. in their hand

לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot To execute נְ֭קָמָה <S%H5360><s%> Ne-ka-mah vengeance בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim; upon the heathen תּֽ֝וֹכֵחֹ֗ת <S%H8433><s%> to-che-Chot, [and] punishments בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> 'um-Mim. upon the people

לֶאְסֹ֣ר <S%H631><s%> le'-Sor To bind מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei-Hem their kings בְּזִקִּ֑ים <S%H2131><s%> be-zik-Kim; with chains וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3513><s%> ve-nich-be-dei-Hem, and their nobles בְּכַבְלֵ֥י <S%H3525><s%> be-chav-Lei with fetters בַרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel. of iron

לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot To execute בָּהֶ֨ם׀ ba-Hem מִשְׁפָּ֬ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat upon them the judgment כָּת֗וּב <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv, written הָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar this honour ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu This לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dav, have all his saints הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
